trans-unit.source: Provides developer-specified data for a pipeline segment.
trans-unit.target: 为管道段提供开发人员指定的数据。

trans-unit.source: You can use this attribute to assign data, in the form of name-value string pairs, for any purpose to a pipeline segment.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可用于出于任何目的到管道段分配的名称 / 值字符串对表单中的数据。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can indicate that an add-in should be loaded into an external process.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指示外接程序应为加载到外部进程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Rebuild%2A> and <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Update%2A> methods, which maintain the store of information about available pipeline segments, use this attribute to identify a segment that has qualification data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Rebuild%2A>和<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Update%2A>方法，维护有关可用的管道段的信息的存储区，使用此特性来标识具有限定数据段。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Update%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInStore.Rebuild%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the qualification data for a pipeline segment, see the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.QualificationData%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的管道段的限定数据，请参阅<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.QualificationData%2A>属性。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.AddInToken.QualificationData%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enumerate the data for all the pipeline segments, see the <xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要枚举所有管道段的数据，请参阅<xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>类。</xref:System.AddIn.Hosting.QualificationDataItem>

trans-unit.source: Qualification data is only read by the host and is not consumed by the add-in system in any other way.
trans-unit.target: 限定数据由主机仅读取，并不由任何其他方式的外接程序系统。

trans-unit.source: You can apply qualification data to a pipeline segment by placing a QualificationDataAttribute attribute next to the segment attribute.
trans-unit.target: 通过放置的段属性旁边的一个 QualificationDataAttribute 特性，你可以应用到管道段限定数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information about pipeline segments and their attributes, see [Pipeline Development](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关管道段和其特性的详细信息，请参阅[管道开发](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.AddIn.Pipeline.QualificationDataAttribute"></xref> class.
The `name` and `value` can be any text.
Any identifier that serves as a key in a key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 任何用作中键/值对的键的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name, which serves as a key, of a key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 获取的名称，它可作为键/值对的密钥。

trans-unit.source: The assigned name for the attribute.
Gets the value of a key/value pair.
The assigned value for the attribute.
